content: these are my two simple all in one turtle patterns the head tail and feet are crocheted in as you go so there isn t any additional parts to sew on it takes around 30 mins to complete one large turtle and about 20 mins for the mini version very useful for gifts as it works up quickly and easily you can use any weight / ply of yarn it is great for stash busting both patterns are under the download button also please do not upload the pattern into facebook group files without permission if you could just share a link to this page that would be great thank you korean although i cannot read korean myself i had a lovely person translate the turtle pattern and she has it available on her blog https //white-ending tistory com/4 please see my other all in one patterns
